document_data.mainbody:
A pitchfork was a common farming tool found in Faer√ªn.
Pitchforks had between three and five prongs, and were used to "pitch" materials such as straw and hay
Auroras Whole Realms Catalogue offered three-pronged maple pitchforks for 2 gp, and Thayan four-pronged steel-headed pitchforks for 9 gp.
